original_title: Modo De Vida - A Goan Sketchbook
overview: A quaint Goan life hides beneath its touristy facade. A Goa of sleepy balcaos, pushy fish-mongers and of pilot bikes flitting on boiling afternoons; of the blend of traditions and a penchant for slow life. The animated sketchbook film explores this erstwhile Portuguese colony.
title: Modo De Vida - A Goan Sketchbook
